attributes.action: Reward our brilliant front-line NHS staff, £2000 bonus for front-line NHS Staff.
attributes.additional_details: In the face of austerity, our NHS front-line stands firm to defend our country, a free for public, coordinated workforce is standing ready to protect her people, therefore, suitable recompense should be issued to reward their efforts and show her people stand in solidarity, with them. A £2000 bonus for the NHS front-line is a modest but respectable figure to issue tax free for the work that is being done to treat and prevent COVID-19.
attributes.background: The British public would like to show its appreciation for all the front-line NHS staff dealing with the outbreak of COVID-19, by recompensing their efforts with an extra £2000, paid as a one off tax free lump sum.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
